verbs.description: [ARG1: tech companies] [V: tighten] up and startups may suffer welcome back to tech chronicle if you ’re open to it please access our subscription interface sorry we ’re closed we ’d all but forgotten about google plus when the search company announced monday that its foray into social networking was kaput the cause of death a wall street journal exposé of google efforts to keep secret a flaw that may have exposed tens of dozens google facebook
